1.4.6: + Added a new page for Marvin.
= Reworked the manifest storing system, should be much faster and have way less issues.

1.4.5: + Added a collectibles tab to the inspect page / profile page. You can now see what exotics people have!
= Soon the Exotics page will be removed in place of this change.

1.4.4: = So many various little bug fixes
= Fixed a manifest not updating issue causing people to get blank screens.
= Fixed a transparency issue with the titlebar
+ Added more badges to the raid activity PGCR
+ Added modifiers to the raid activity PGCR, but they are not the active modifiers, They most likely will not be staying.
= Fixed some streaming tools in the background
+ Made the glory checking tool grab the last played pvp match (includes quickplay, sorry, lazy)
+ Made the glory checking tool auto-update every 30 seconds
+ Added a grayed out news tab, that will be used for updates like this, eventually.

1.4.3: + Added a glory checking tool, at https://guardianstats.com/glorycheck

1.4.2: + Overhauled the login system entirely. Should work way more effectively.
+ Moved the character selection option to inside the activities page, as it is the only one that uses it currently
+ Added tooltips for the donation badges

1.4.1: = Fixed a manifest setting on first load bug
= Fixed a bug where normal leviatian raid completions were including prestige raid completions.

1.4.0: + Added medal tooltips on the activity page.
+ Added item tooltips on the activity page
= Made the changelog bigger, (It ran out of space)
= Fixed a heap of lint errors

1.3.9: + Added tooltips for seals/titles on inspect and profile page.
+ Added mutliple badge support for donators
= Fixed a bug which prevented accounts without activity data to load.

1.3.8: = Fixed bug with the amount of time spent playing raids. It now shows accurate time.
+ Added flawless tracking to raids that support flawless tracking. Such as: Last Wish, Scourge of the Past, Crown of Sorrow
+ Added option to toggle seals that are not yet obtained, Hidden by default.

1.3.7: + Home page now instantly loades and deals with the manifest loading/downloading in the background.
+ Added more checks to make the website respond better. If trying to load a page without the manifest it will wait.

1.3.6: + Changes to raid activities on the Activities page. (Not completed)
= Fixed a bug with some accounts not loading on inspect due to them not ever having played pvp.

1.3.5: + Added settings, There isn't much in the way of customization yet, but it's the first step.

1.3.3: = Changed settings to be a seperate component.
+ Added recent bungie news to the homepage

1.3.2: + Added a new loading animation, I love it tbh, I hope you do too!
+ Added more information to the hover over items on the exotics page.
- Removed the triumphs menu item. Since that might not come for release.
+ Created the changelog, This is the start!
